source_sentence: 【增收】波羅提尊者(西天無相宗首)因異見王問。
translation: [Accession] Venerable Pratibhāna (head of the Western Heaven's Signless School) was asked by the King of Dissent.

He said.

'I was born in a womb as a body.

He stood tall and held his staff in dignified deportment.
(Benjamin I).
"Overturning the seagrass, he seeks to know himself.
He stirred up the heavens and Kun and saw peace.
The two elders didn't know where to go.
The style of the school has spread its family name for a thousand years.
(Zhengfanhao).
"Jinseok Caoqi grew a great sense of self-conceit.
He stayed overnight for a short time. How dare he?
"In Yongjia City, he expounds the style of the school.
The river, moon, and pine breezes have no shore.''
(Wu Chan Cai), Vol. 8
